sg.edu.smu.ecology

Class EventBroadcaster

  • java.lang.Object
    • sg.edu.smu.ecology.EventBroadcaster

  • public class EventBroadcaster
extends java.lang.Object
    Created by Anuroop PATTENA VANIYAR (anurooppv@smu.edu.sg) on 1/6/2016.

    Event broadcaster is used to publish as well as receive events from the connected devices in the ecology.

      • subscribe

        public void subscribe(java.lang.String eventType,
                      EventReceiver eventReceiver,
                      boolean backgroundEvent)
        Register an event receiver for the events of a certain type.
        Parameters:
        eventType - the even type
        eventReceiver - the receiver to subscribed.
        backgroundEvent - if the event is a background event or not

      • publish

        public void publish(java.lang.String eventType,
                    java.util.List<java.lang.Object> data)
        Publish an event. The event will be transmitted to any receiver that subscribe to the event's type from any device of the ecology.
        Parameters:
        eventType - the event type
        data - the event's data
